name: engine_state.intervals
description: Creates engine state intervals with start and end time for each state and replaces int values by the engine states: OFF, IDLE, and ON. The intervals are split at day boundaries if they span multiple days.

metadata.comment: Date to which the start_ms of the interval belongs to.
The organization ID for which the engine state object stat is reported.
The device ID for which the engine state object stat is reported.
The time in milliseconds at which the engine state starts.
The engine state ("OFF", "ON", "IDLE") during the time interval [start_ms, end_ms)
The time in milliseconds at which the engine state ends.
The duration in milliseconds of the original interval from which this interval is derived.
